item.description:
By Popular request (I hear that people miss ordering the nachos), We're off to one of our traditional haunts for Stump! Team Trivia.

Hot off our recent victory at Doherty's East Ave, can the Providence newcomers keep up their winning streak? The only way to make sure is to attend yourself and contribute every scrap of movie, music, pop-culture, geography, history and other random knowledge you have to another victory!

Game starts at 8:30 and runs for about 2 hours!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a table sign, as usual, we'll probably be near the front entrance.
item.name: Stump! Trivia @ Union Station
